main event: An Army Officer from Camp Hood, Texas reported sighting an unusual light in the sky on March 5, 1949.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing a fire trail on the object, which was approximately the size of a basketball.
Radio interference was experienced after the sighting, indicating some form of unusual activity.
The object was described as very bright, with a long trail that disappeared at once.
It was observed to be traveling very fast, disappearing into the clouds in a few seconds.
The sighting occurred on a clear night with no obstructions to vision.
witnesses: 1st Lt. from the 12th AIB, Camp Hood, Texas
